name: Wink GameBoy - Beta 2
description:
Wink Beta 2 is up and ready to play! Read the devlog to learn about the fixes, improvements, and the development process

Wink’s never been this retro before!

Wink is taking inspiration from Gameboy classics like Super Mario Land and Link’s Awakening, but doing his own little thing

Explore the weird and cute post-apocalyptic world of The Outskirts while collecting coins and mysterious ancient treasures like floppy disks and cassette tapes

There are two levels and plenty of secrets. Have fun!

I’m using the awesome game making app GBstudio to create Wink. GBstudio enables people to make games that run on real Gameboy and Gameboy Color hardware! And v2.0 beta has made it possible to make platform games too!I never imagined I’d be able to do this, and I’m so extremely excited that it’s actually possible
